message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its benefits, I'm offering it at $14,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to consider $12,800 for the product?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I can't go as low as $12,800, I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,800. This is my best price and reflects the true value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save more. Would you be willing to consider $13,200 for the product?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $13,200 is cutting it very close to my bottom line. I can do $13,500, but that's my absolute final offer.
I understand you're trying to be fair, but I'm still not comfortable with $13,500. Would you be willing to consider $13,000 for the product?
